TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The AuthType enumeration is used to specify the authentication method to use on a connection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Anonymous = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the connection should be made without passing credentials. The value is equal to 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Basic = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that basic authentication should be used on the connection. The value is equal to 1.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Digest = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the Digest Access Authentication should be used on the connection. The value is equal to 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Dpa = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Indicates that Distributed Password Authentication (DPA) should be used on the connection. The value is equal to 6.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType External = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Indicates an external method will be used to authenticate the connection. The value is equal to 8.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Kerberos = int32(9)

Docs.summary: Indicates that Kerberos authentication should be used on the connection. The value is equal to 9.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Msn = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Indicates that it is authenticated by "Microsoft Network Authentication Service". The value is equal to 7.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Negotiate = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that Microsoft Negotiate authentication should be used on the connection. The value is equal to 2.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Ntlm = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that Windows NT Challenge/Response (NTLM) authentication should be used on the connection. The value is equal to 3.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType Sicily = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Indicates a negotiation mechanism (Sicily) will be used to choose MSN, DPA or NTLM. This should be used for LDAPv2 servers only. The value is equal to 5.
